definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: Do yuo want to help your family save cash when times are tight ?
sentences.chinese: 既然經濟不景氣，想幫家裏節省開支嗎？

sentences.english: AP, Sarah, and Maybelle Carter knew that the economy was very bad.
sentences.chinese: 美聯社，莎拉和梅貝爾卡特知道，經濟非常不景氣。

sentences.english: The government predicates that the market collapse was caused by Asian financial crisis.
sentences.chinese: 政府宣佈市場不景氣是由於亞洲金融危機而引起的。

sentences.english: Industry depressions usually cause misery among the workers.
sentences.chinese: 工業不景氣常常使工人受害。

sentences.english: Worried your employer might cut your position in a downturn?
sentences.chinese: 擔心在不景氣的時候第一個被拿來開刀嗎？

sentences.english: In times of economic downturn, a dangerous calculus often emerges.
sentences.chinese: 在經濟不景氣的時候，常常會出現一種危險的演算。

sentences.english: The nation-wide development of real estate prosperous level have maintained fast rising develop situation.
sentences.chinese: 全國房地產開發景氣程度保持了快速上升的發展態勢。

sentences.english: But with the world steel industry deep in the doldrums, who needed iron ore carries?
sentences.chinese: 世界鋼鐵工業很不景氣，誰還需要這些鐵礦砂船呢？

sentences.english: So you know, from a personal perspective, we are still very much in a recession.
sentences.chinese: 所以，我個人認爲，我們還是處於不景氣狀態。

sentences.english: The downturn has not been all bad news for HBS, though.
sentences.chinese: 但是，經濟不景氣對於哈佛商學院來說是一個壞消息。

sentences.english: Tales of greed and fraud during the boom years abound.
sentences.chinese: 在經濟景氣年份，充斥着貪婪和欺騙的故事。

sentences.english: Business was rather depressed after war.
With the depression of twe industry, the expenses of hotels or restaurants are beside their benefits.
sentences.chinese: 隨着旅業界的不景氣，賓館和飯店也開端捉襟見肘。

sentences.english: I miss the good old days when the economy was booming.
sentences.chinese: 我懷念那些景氣大好的美好舊時光。

sentences.english: At the nadir of recession, he had to sell his property and move into his parents' house.
sentences.chinese: 在景氣最低迷時，他必須把產業賣掉搬回去和父母住。

sentences.english: Japan's economy seems doomed to fall back into recession.
sentences.chinese: 日本經濟看來也鐵定要跌回到不景氣。

definition: private business/opposite: state-owned enterprise 國有企業|国有企业[guo2 you3 qi3 ye4]
variant of 動蕩|动荡[dong4 dang4]
variant of 復甦|复苏[fu4 su1]/to recover (health, economic)/to resuscitate/anabiosis
to intensify/to sharpen/to accelerate/to aggravate/to exacerbate/to embitter
stuck and not moving forward (idiom); stagnant/in a rut/at a standstill
